title: Azay-le-Rideau
extract:
Azay-le-Rideau is a small town in France.

1 Château du Gerfaut, Le Gerfaut, ☏ +33 6 62 20 81 06, contact@chateaudugerfaut.com. The family castle Château du Gerfaut is a smart alternative to hotel stay in charming rooms and suite with all the modern comfort. Guest rooms have just been restored, respecting the heritage, and highlight the noble materials preserved: parquet floors, magnificent fireplaces, mouldings, and a terrace in front of a park. €99-230. 
 Hotel de Biencourt, 7 rue Balzac, ☏ +33 247452075. Closely located to the famous Chateau. 17 rooms and a central courtyard garden.
